System-Managed Reports - Financial Summaries 
bookmark_border
On this page
Monthly payments summary

This section contains the Payment Summary report. This report provides a snapshot of the total revenue earned across different revenue sources in both USD and local currency. This is only available if you are paid via AdSense.

Monthly payments summary

This report summarizes monthly ad revenue for all content types. Each row in the report includes monthly ad revenue totals for the content. The report may contain multiple rows per type if there are revenue adjustments for the content related to backpay, conflict resolution, etc.

The reportType id for this report is content_owner_payments_summary_a1.

Contents
Primary Key:
revenue_type
adjustment_type
currency_code

Additional fields:
partner_revenue_usd
partner_revenue_local
notes
